Function reference

All functions

c_ngrams()
Concatenate ngrams in a given character vector
clean_basic()
Clean body of text
convert_pdf_text()
Convert pdf to text
convert_to_dtm()
Convert data frame with word frequencies into document term matrix
count_docs_per_topic()
Count documents per main topic
find_meta_stopwords()
Find custom stop-phrases based on metadata file
geocode_thesis_locations()
Geocode thesis locations
get_ngrams()
Get ngrams from a corpus
get_number_of_topics()
Get number of topics for LDA model empirically
get_tf_idf()
Get tf-idf statistic
get_top_words_per_corpus()
Extract top n words with the highest count across all documents
get_top_words_per_document()
Extract top n words with the highest count per document
get_top_words_per_topic()
Extract top n terms with the highest count across all topics
get_topic_proportions()
Get topic proportions in an LDA model
get_topics()
Get topics for a given data frame of documents and words
get_word_counts()
Get word counts for corpus
head_text()
Show the beginning of each of the element of a string vector
name_topics()
Add pseudo-names to topics in an LDA model
normalise_words()
Check for special Latin letters
replacement_checker()
Check the result of string replacement
short_words()
Produces the table with the most popular short words in the body of text
thesis_stopwords()
Adjustable list of stopwords associated with master theses
tokenize()
Tokenise a given corpus
topic_words_to_ai_prompt()
Generate prompt for topic naming
urbanism_stopwords()
Adjustable list of stopwords associated with urbanism
vis_lda()
Visualise LDA model
vis_top_words_per_corpus()
Visualise top words per corpus
vis_top_words_per_topic()
Visualise top words per topic
visualize_thesis_locations()
Visualise thesis locations
word_combos()
Create a combination of words
word_vec_combos()
Create a combination of words
